summary:
Scientology is a set of beliefs and practices created by L. Ron Hubbard. It started as a therapy called Dianetics but later became a religion. Scientologists believe in reincarnation and a process called auditing to remove mental blocks. The Church of Scientology, founded in 1954, is the main organization, but there are also independent practitioners.

Scientology has faced many controversies, including criminal activities and allegations of exploitation. It has been called a cult and a business, and its recognition as a religion varies by country. Despite criticisms, it has gained legal religious status in some places.
title: Scientology
